hero.subtitle: Europe's strategic B2B partner for high-voltage EV modules and LiFePO4 solutions

products.title: Product Categories
products.subtitle: Engineered for reliability. Sourced for performance.

ev.title: EV Battery Modules
ev.desc: Tier-1 high-voltage modules for major EV platforms. Rigorously tested for SOH (State of Health) and internal resistance to ensure OEM-level performance.

hybrid.title: Hybrid (HEV/PHEV) Systems
hybrid.desc: Specialized inventory of replacement packs for hybrid vehicles. We provide certified high-drain solutions for Toyota, Lexus, and European PHEV models.

lifepo4.title: LiFePO4 Industrial Cells
lifepo4.desc: Safe, ultra-long-life Lithium Iron Phosphate solutions. Designed for high-cycle industrial applications, backup power, and heavy-duty machinery.

logistics.label: Logistic Capability
logistics.title: Strategic Gateway to Europe.
logistics.description: Europe's premier B2B supplier for high-voltage EV modules and industrial power systems. Fast-track logistics and reliable delivery across the EU.
logistics.feature_desc: Partnerships with major freight carriers for palletized delivery within 3-5 days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Direct wholesale pricing and technical support available upon inquiry.
